Text: THANKS !!!! THANKS!!! THANKS!!!! I HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR THIS SOUNDTRACK SINCE I SAW THE MOVIE PRE-OSCARS... thanks "jaro1981".really...thanks big time... I cant really explain how happy you made me :)
